long_description: Big in features and small in price, the well-cushioned Burton Felix snowboard boots bring supreme comfort to your days on the slopes at a price that leaves you money to buy a lift ticket or two. Women-specific True Fit(TM) Design creates boots and bindings specifically for the way a woman rides, ensuring complete control, total power and ultimate fun. Imprint(TM) 3 liners wrap feet in comfortable EVA foam for cushioned support; Plush Cuff 1.0 offers comfort around calves; liners secure with rip-and-stick closures. Strategically placed backstays ensure a consistent flex throughout boot life; medium-flex 3D molded tongues; internal snow gussets keep snow out. Molded EVA footbeds features ESS support shanks; rip-and-stick J-bars on liners provide extra support. Streamlined Speed Zone(TM) shell lacing system lets you fine-tune the fit quickly and easily; customize the upper and lower zones in a matter of seconds. New PodBED dual-density outsoles feature B3 gel for extra cushioning, and reflective foil to keep the cold out and the warmth inside your boots.
short_description: Big in features and small in price, the well-cushioned Burton Felix snowboard boots bring supreme comfort to your days on the slopes at a price that leaves you money to buy a lift ticket or two.
